LanguageData.WorldCameraMovement.label: camera movement
LanguageData.WorldCameraMovement.helpText: mouse wheel to zoom in or {keyword: MapZoom_In}: {main} Key MapZoom_Out.\n\nPAN key: MapDolly_Up {} - {{main}: MapDolly_Left - basic: MapDolly_Down} {main}: Do MapDolly_Right or the main drag, click the mouse wheel.
